answers.answer: Oh my!! I wish u all the luck in the world. Please keep us uptated. have u had this problem with ur previous pregnancies?Again Good luck to u

Atlantisea ...i wish you will bring the little beautiful baby girl safe to this world ..i hope you both will do great ..and i wish you an easy delivery at the best state of health ...keep us updated ..i will keep thinking of you ...

Ohhh GOOD LUCK!!! I hope everything goes great and you have a fast safe delivery and a healthy beautiful baby girl! Can't wait to see pictures!! Looking forward to seeing your update and hearing all about it, good luck! :)So exciting!! One by one we're all starting to deliver!!!
OMG this is crazy!!  Good luck and hope everything goes well for you!!  We're all here waiting for your safe home coming with that baby girl...

HI Hon!Am really glad you're off to the hospital. At least they'll be watching you closely and you and bubs will be fine.  Sounds like your Doc is well on top of things.Your baby will be here in a few days.Looks like a lot of us are eager beavers and our babies don't want to wait.Looking forward to hearing how you go, that all is well and you are safely delivered.Sally
good luck. Sounds like preeclampsia to me....thats what they are watching me for!keep us updated!

My blood pressure continued to climb so they ended up keeping me overnight (like they said they would) and because my blood test was ok, they didn't induce me today (that was a possibility).So I have to go back to the labour ward to get checked tomorrow (sun) and then again on Monday and I'm booked to be induced Tuesday morning! Much earlier than I was expecting, but I'm not complaining..So my bub should be born on the 20th Jan 2009!!Thanks everyone for all the support!

Hi,Am so glad that things are being closely monitored.I am also looking at 20th for my baby!  They will stop the meds to stop contractions tomorrow or Monday, and if it don't happen naturally, induce on Tues.Good luck to us!

OMG how exciting for you both...I know not under the best Circumstances, but atleast you've both did want you could do best and that was to hold those girls in for awhile :)I'm feeling aweful once again and didn't sleep at all lastnight.  I have to work today and hoping that will help me, if not, I'm going to L&D again....I'll keep you all posted....I won't be back on for about 6 hours.Take care everyone and wishing everyone the best!

Atlantisea, Yay!!!  I hope your baby girl is beautiful and healthy.Yours too, Sally!!!I can't say enough how excited I am for all these babies to be  entering the world.Safety to you both during your inductions.  And also to everyone else who may pop a little earlier than anticipated.
Good Luck you two! Tomorrows the big day! I wish you both a healthy and safe delivery and very healthy babies! Can't wait to see pictures and hear all about it!

question: My feet have swelled up like a balloon, my blood pressure is up and I have a trace of protein in my urine. I've come home to pack a bag and then I have to go back to hospital to be admitted..I'm told that if my blood test (from 1hr ago) is abnormal then I'll be induced tomorrow.I'm being kept in overnight for observation, and have been penciled in for an induction on Tuesday (because Monday is fully booked).My doctor has said that 'best case scenario- I'll be induced by the end of next week'.Wish me luck!
title: Things are happening for me!
